Installation
================================================================================


You can install begin2018 via pip:

.. code-block:: bash

    $ pip install begin2018


or clone it and install it:

.. code-block:: bash

    $ git clone https://github.com/AmaanKarim/begin2018.git
    $ cd begin2018
    $ python setup.py install
